1qa_croquetas.title: One quadrillion
1qa_croquetas.description: How about you go outside for a while?

1sp_croquetas.title: One septillion
1sp_croquetas.description: Have you thought about looking for a job?

1nn_croquetas.title: One nonillion
1nn_croquetas.description: I didn't know that number existed.

primer_skin.title: New look
primer_skin.description: Change your skin for the first time.

autoclicker.title: Autoclicker
autoclicker.description: 250 clicks in 10 seconds? I doubt it...

fanboy.title: Fanboy
fanboy.description: Click on the studio name 10 times. Thanks for the support!

certified_obsession.title: Certified Obsession
certified_obsession.description: Click on the studio name 1000 times. We're a bit scared...

options.title: Options
options.generalVolumeTooltip: Controls the overall volume of the game.
options.musicVolumeTooltip: Controls the volume of the background music.
options.sfxVolumeTooltip: Controls the volume of the sound effects (SFX).
options.showMascotTooltip: Shows or hides the mascot on the screen.
options.saveGameTooltip: Manually save your game in the browser.
options.exportGameTooltip: Download a .json file with your progress.
options.importGameTooltip: Load a game from a .json file.
options.shareProgressTooltip: Share your stats or copy them to the clipboard.
options.resetGameTooltip: Reset your progress. This action cannot be undone.

resetGameModal.title: Reset game
resetGameModal.message: Are you sure you want to reset your progress? This action cannot be undone ‚Äî it will erase local progress and will also remove your current anonymous leaderboard entry and session.

saveGameModal.successMessage: Your progress has been saved correctly in the browser!
saveGameModal.errorMessage: There was an error saving. Please try again.

exportGameModal.successMessage: The game has been downloaded correctly.

importGameModal.title: Import game
importGameModal.message: Do you want to load this game? Your current progress will be completely replaced.

shareGameModal.title: My progress in Croqueta Clicker

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.name: Name
leaderboard.scoreSubmissionsDisabled: Score submissions are disabled in DEBUG mode

user.usernameTaken: This username is already taken. Please choose another one.
user.invalidUsername: Invalid username. Please use only letters, numbers, and underscores (3-15 characters).
user.setUsernameError: Error setting username. Please try again.
user.usernameReservedOffline: Offline ‚Äî the username will be reserved when you reconnect.
user.debugDisabledInteractions: Username changes and leaderboard interactions are disabled in DEBUG mode

available.title: Update available
available.message: A new version of Croqueta Clicker is available. Reload now to apply it?

producers.title: Producers
producers.producer_2_description: A professional cook who makes croquettes for you.
producers.producer_3_description: An industrial fryer that produces croquettes on a large scale.
producers.producer_4_description: An automated croquette factory. Approved by Chicote.
producers.producer_6_description: Advanced robot that produces croquettes at a high rate.
producers.producer_7_description: Imports croquettes from all over the world for mass distribution.
producers.producer_8_description: Veneration and promotion of the croquette.
producers.producer_9_description: An interdimensional portal that brings croquettes from other universes.
producers.producer_10_description: AI that dominates the universe and produces croquettes on a large scale.
producers.producer_11_description: Corporation that exploits resources from different timelines to manufacture croquettes.
producers.producer_12_description: A quantum engine that synthesizes croquettes instantly.
producers.producer_13_description: A star-sized croquette with infinite flavor.
producers.producer_14_description: A self-aware program that modifies the game's code to create more croquettes.
producers.producer_15_description: The ultimate expression of the croquette producer: Yourself, obsessed beyond madness.

1.name: Normal
1.description: A humble croquette from the supermarket

3.name: Chicken
3.description: A juicy and tasty chicken croquette

4.name: Cheese
4.description: A creamy and delicious cheese croquette

5.name: Cod
5.description: A traditional and tasty cod croquette

6.name: Mushroom
6.description: An exquisite and aromatic mushroom croquette

9.name: Burnt
9.description: Too much time in the fryer... crunchy to a crisp.

10.name: Cosmic
10.description: Shines with the power of the universe. Not suitable for humans.

11.name: King
11.description: His majesty the croquette, sovereign of all fried foods.

12.name: Pope
12.description: The chosen croquette: wise, firm and a little too salty.

14.name: DJ
14.description: The croquette that plays the music at the party.

15.name: Super
15.description: A heroic croquette that saves the day.

18.name: Cookie
18.description: A croquette in an identity crisis.

19.name: Banana?
19.description: A tropical croquette that leaves you with existential doubts.

20.name: Sandwich...
20.description: A sandwich filled with croquettes, for the bravest.

22.name: 3D
22.description: A low-poly croquette, but just as tasty.

23.name: Frozen
23.description: Icy on the inside and outside. Microwave at your own risk.

24.name: Halloween
24.description: A spooky croquette full of pumpkin mischief.

25.name: Japanese
25.description: Breaded with honor: soy, a hint of wasabi and a mystery roll.

26.name: Love
26.description: Breaded with hearts. Perfect to gift to your other half-croquette.

27.name: Meme
27.description: Went viral online. Now taking selfies next to the fryer.

28.name: Monster
28.description: A croquette with a curious monster shape. What could it be?

29.name: Christmas
29.description: Festive and glittery; apparently it tastes like turr√≥n.

30.name: Ninja
30.description: Silent and deadly in the art of snacking. Blink and it's gone.

31.name: Pirate
31.description: Arr! Steals croquettes and sings sea shanties while frying.

32.name: Rugby
32.description: Tough, compact and perfect for post-match energy.

33.name: Alien
33.description: Foreign visitor, with a childish and conflictive personality

clicker.buyProducer: Buy a producer to start earning croquettes automatically!

tutorial.welcome: Hi! I'm Croquetita. Welcome to the world of croquettes! Click on the big croquette to start your culinary adventure.
tutorial.first_click: Excellent! You've just cooked your first croquette. Keep clicking to get more!
tutorial.keep_clicking: You're doing great! Every click counts. When you have enough croquettes, you can buy automatic producers.
tutorial.first_producer: You can now buy your first producer! Go to the menu on the right and buy a "Click" that will automatically cook croquettes.
tutorial.first_upgrade: Upgrades increase the number of croquettes per click. Invest in them wisely!
tutorial.producers_tip: Tip: The most expensive producers are more efficient. Save up for the best ones!
tutorial.keep_upgrading: You're making great progress. Don't forget to buy upgrades to increase your click power.
tutorial.thousand_milestone: 1,000 croquettes! This is just the beginning. The croquette empire awaits you.
tutorial.balance_tip: Balance your investment between producers and upgrades for maximum efficiency.
tutorial.five_thousand: 5,000 croquettes! You're on the right track. Keep it up!
tutorial.ten_thousand: 10K croquettes! You already have a real factory. Did you know you can change the look of your croquette?
tutorial.skins_unlock: Visit the Skins section to customize your croquette. There are many different designs!
tutorial.fifty_thousand: 50K... This is getting serious. You'll soon reach numbers you never imagined.
tutorial.hundred_thousand: 100,000 croquettes! You are officially a master croquette maker.
tutorial.quarter_million: A quarter of a million... Who knew clicking could be so addictive?
tutorial.half_million: 500K croquettes. You surely have achievements unlocked!
tutorial.first_million: ONE MILLION CROQUETTES!!! You are officially a croquette-millionaire!
tutorial.million_advice: With these numbers, advanced producers are starting to be worth it. Invest heavily!
tutorial.five_million: 5 million... Have you considered opening a croquette franchise?
tutorial.ten_million: 10M! At this rate, you'll soon be swimming in croquettes (not literally... or will you?).
tutorial.twenty_five_million: 25 million croquettes. This is no longer a game, it's a lifestyle.
tutorial.fifty_million: 50M croquettes. Have you tried all the skins? There are whole collections to discover!
tutorial.hundred_million: 100 MILLION! You are no longer human, you are a living legend of clicking.
tutorial.quarter_billion: A quarter of a billion... The numbers don't even make sense anymore. But keep going!
tutorial.half_billion: 500M. A piece of advice, high-level upgrades multiply your production exponentially.
tutorial.first_billion: ONE BILLION!!! There's no turning back now. You are the king of croquettes.
tutorial.five_billion: 5 billion croquettes. You could feed an entire country. Or three.
tutorial.ten_billion: 10B... Do you still remember what your first click was like? Those were the days...
tutorial.fifty_billion: 50 billion. Warning: These numbers can cause dizziness.
tutorial.hundred_billion: 100B! Your production per second is probably higher than the GDP of some countries.
tutorial.half_trillion: Half a trillion... Do you still have achievements to unlock? Check them out!
tutorial.first_trillion: ONE TRILLION!!! We're not in Kansas anymore, Dorothy. Not even on Earth.
tutorial.ten_trillion: 10 trillion. At this point, it's just abstract numerical art.
tutorial.hundred_trillion: 100T. Tip: Premium producers are your best investment now.
tutorial.first_quadrillion: QUADRILLION! The mathematicians are proud. Your parents... not so much. But congratulations!
tutorial.quintillion_zone: Quintillion reached. You lost touch with reality a long time ago. Keep it up!
tutorial.sextillion_warning: Sextillion... I'm worried about your mental health, but I respect your dedication.
tutorial.septillion_madness: Septillion. You have officially transcended. You are one with the croquettes.
tutorial.octillion_gods: Octillion... The croquette gods watch you with respect and a little fear.
tutorial.nonillion_legend: A... Nonillion? I had to Google that number. Go outside for a while.
tutorial.decillion_limit: A decillion... I think that's enough. Go for a walk, please.
tutorial.more_and_beyond: More than a decillion? Seriously, go see the sunlight. The croquettes can wait.
tutorial.clicks_1000: 1,000 clicks! Your finger deserves a medal.
tutorial.clicks_10000: 10K clicks... I hope you're using good hand ergonomics.
tutorial.clicks_100000: 100K clicks!!! Your mouse will never be the same. F for your mouse.
tutorial.level_5: Level 5! You're no longer a rookie. High-level upgrades are close.
tutorial.level_10: Level 10 reached. Mid-level upgrades are now available!
tutorial.level_20: Level 20! You're a veteran now. Late-game upgrades await you.
tutorial.level_30: Level 30... The most powerful upgrades are now within your reach. Use them well!
tutorial.level_50: LEVEL 50!! You are a legend. Only the most dedicated get here.
tutorial.level_75: Level 75 reached. Are you still there? Incredible dedication!
tutorial.level_100: LEVEL 100! You have mastered the art of croquettes. You are an inspiration to all.
tutorial.level_200: LEVEL 200!! You are a living legend in the world of croquettes.
tutorial.tip_efficiency: Calculate the cost per croquette/second of each producer to optimize your strategy.
tutorial.tip_combo: Upgrades and producers work in synergy. Combine them wisely!
tutorial.tip_achievements: Many achievements are hidden. Experiment to find them all!
tutorial.tip_patience: Patience is key. Sometimes it's better to wait and save for the next big upgrade.
tutorial.tip_active_vs_idle: Did you know? You can play actively or passively. Find your style!
tutorial.humor_addiction: Remember that croquettes are not real but your addiction is.
tutorial.humor_grass: Please, go out and touch grass from time to time.
tutorial.humor_sleep: Have you slept today? The croquettes will be here when you get back. Probably.
tutorial.humor_family: Your family misses you. But I understand that croquettes are your priority.
tutorial.humor_finger: Remember to stretch your fingers. We don't want you to end up with carpal tunnel syndrome.
tutorial.humor_croqueta_addict: If croquettes were a drug, you'd already be in rehab. Keep it up!
tutorial.humor_infinite_clicks: Do you think you can make infinite clicks? Keep trying!
tutorial.humor_croqueta_universe: In some parallel universe, you are already the emperor of croquettes.
tutorial.motivacion_1: You can do it! Every croquette brings you closer to greatness.
tutorial.motivacion_2: Don't give up now. The big numbers are just around the corner.
tutorial.motivacion_3: You are amazing. Look how far you've come since that first click.
tutorial.help_navigation: Use the menus to get the most out of your croquette experience.
tutorial.help_achievements: Did you know you can see all your detailed achievements?
tutorial.help_skins: Skins don't give bonuses, but they make your croquette look great or at least different...
tutorial.general_help: Need help? Explore the different menus or just keep clicking. You decide!

confirm.title: Enable debug mode
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to enable debug mode? This will permanently mark your save as "debug" until you reset it.
